participant_2.background:
I love the sound of a classic car engine, it's like music to my ears.
I sometimes play video games for hours on end, even though I know I should be doing something more productive.
i am highly educated.
my favorite drink is chocolate milk.
i am twenty five years old.

content.text: Hey there, my name is participant_1.
Hey there! I'm participant_2. It's nice to meet you!
You too! What are some of your hobbies?
I love playing video games, going for drives, and listening to classic car engines. What about you?
I love listening to music, playing video games, and spending time with my family.
That's great! What kind of music do you like to listen to?
I love all kinds of music, but my favorite band is the Beastie Boys.
I've never heard of them before, but I'll have to check them out! What's your favorite song by them?
My favorite song is "Sabotage." It's a really upbeat and fun song.
I'll definitely have to check it out! What are some of your favorite video games?
I love playing Call of Duty, Mario Kart, and Super Smash Bros.
I love playing Mario Kart too! It's so much fun to play with friends.
Me too! I'm always looking for new people to play with.
Well, I'm always up for a game of Mario Kart.
Great! We should exchange friend codes sometime.
